html:
Role Voice type Premiere cast,
6 February 1813
(Conductor: -)
Tancredi, an exiled Syracusan soldier contralto or mezzo-soprano
Amenaide, the daughter of a noble family, in love with Tancredi soprano
Argirio, father of Amenaide; head of his family, at war with the family of Orbazzano tenor
Orbazzano, the head of his noble family, at war with the family of Argirio bass
Isaura, friend to Amenaide contralto
Roggiero, Tancredi's squire mezzo-soprano or tenor
Knights, nobles, squires, Syracusans, Saracens; ladies-in-waiting, warriors, pages, guards, etc
